name: Lucidity
description: Self-aware, consciously guided dreaming prized by scholars and perfectionists.

name: Nostalgia
description: Bittersweet echoes of the past, memory-laced scenes and familiar places.

name: Euphoria
description: Surges of joy and wonder that saturate the dream with elation.

name: Nightmare
description: Dark imagery and visceral fear; unstable but emotionally potent.

name: Prophecy
description: Symbols and sequences rumored to foreshadow real events.

name: Surrealism
description: Impossible juxtapositions and dream logic that defy reality.

name: Serenity
description: Calm waters, quiet rooms, and restful breath; soothing by design.

name: Flight
description: Weightless escape and skyward freedom; the classic flying dream.

name: Oceanic
description: Tides, whalesong, and deep-blue infinity; vast and meditative.

name: Labyrinth
description: Endless corridors and shifting maps; mystery with a hint of dread.
